player how to make it work

Follow these Steps.

1. Burn or mount the image. (use Daemon tools lite)
2. Install the game and use the keygen when asked for a serial.
3. Copy over the cracked content. (which is TSM.ex_ and change it to TSM.exe you will have to remove the original TSM.exe file)
4. Play the game.
